html:
3.26.24  2:49 pm   do you perform the so-called 'car test' when you think you're finished producing a song?

      not always

3.26.24  1:51 pm   can you solve a rubiks cube

      maybe but i've never done it before

3.26.24  12:49 pm   how do you get over rejection?

      with reflection. a starting point maybe: start thinking about whom you've rejected in the past

3.26.24  11:59 am   Goblins or ghouls

      how about 1 of each, in an alternating sequence

3.26.24  10:28 am   How do you know a project is finished? How do you overcome the countless possibilities and directions a project can take?

      try it one way this time, and another way the next time

3.26.24  9:43 am   would it be worth the time and money to adjust the earths orbit and spin so our days/years are exactly 24 hours/365 days?

      no

3.26.24  8:58 am   what is the optimal time of day to eat dinner

      3pm

3.26.24  5:40 am   Do you follow a certain approach as to when you capitalise sentence beginnings (on this page)? Do you do it when you want to introduce a new paragraph/section? 

      i do it when it's useful for communication

3.26.24  12:49 am   you've said sometimes it's hard for you to work in a group and you make all your stuff yourself. i'm the kind of guy who finds it very natural to make stuff when working in a group. however right now i'm at a point where i wanna make some projects on my own, and i feel like it's so hard to imagine the moment when i'm really "done"; like when all the ideas, writing, performing, mixing etc. are all in my hands, instead of something i just got done along the way. idk, you know what i mean? do you have any advising words

      there's no final answer to any of this. what you wanna do is screw it up one way this time, then screw it up an alternate way the next time

3.25.24  10:08 pm   I have a song In my head but my fingers are not good enough at keeping up with the speed. Any advice?

      spend more time playing, and find some way to enjoy it in the meantime, to keep you happy during the long inevitable process of improvement

3.25.24  9:34 pm   making a promo flyer for my band, do you have any ideas on cool designs or slogans to include or anything

      look at everyone else's flyers and do it exactly the same way. that way it will look professional and stand out

3.25.24  9:01 pm   guitar is hard i wish i could just get good instantly

      to get you through this middle stage, maybe you could find some avant garde way to believe you are already good

3.25.24  8:36 pm   Why do people say the entire spelled out version of WW1 or WW2 when its way easier to just say world war 1 or world war 2?

      i've never heard anyone speak out the letters. i've only seen that way in writing, where it is indeed shorter, and when spoken i've only heard it as words, which is of course quicker

3.25.24  8:20 pm   what's your favorite thing about making music and why?

      it can help express things that can't otherwise be expressed

3.25.24  8:14 pm   Would you agree that music genres are confusing?

     they are not capable of pinning down what you may actually do with music

      I believe some songs could fit in all or none of any music genre...

      sure, otherwise it's probably no fun anyway. it's like the difference between having a friend who can only speak in sentences that have exactly been said before, vs having a friend who can truly come up with something genuinely brand new that actually means something now

3.25.24  8:00 pm   which bits of granola are the best? the big or small ones?

      medium

3.25.24  7:23 pm   opinion on capital letters?

      like a second font, built right in to every font

3.25.24  6:52 pm   what are your opinions on simulations?

      too real. need to practice first with a simulation simulation

3.25.24  5:17 pm   Are you a tech company CEO?

      no

3.25.24  5:16 pm   Do you have any tips on making a chicken literate

      no

3.25.24  5:08 pm   what should i do next

      what did you do previously

3.25.24  4:56 pm If somebody is upset at me about something that Isaid as a joke, and I genuinely don't feel like I did anything wrong, do I apologize? I feel bad that the person is upset, but I don't feel sorry for what I said. And if I apologize to someone I want it to be a genuine apology and not just "Oh, sorry that you were offended". For context (and this sounds silly in retrospect)... my friend had jellybeans and she said she did not like the black jellybeans and I made a very dumb joke that was "Oh, wow, that's racist" and her response was to get all downtrodden and say "I really don't appreciate you calling me racist. That's not cool."....then the rest of the day she was giving me the cold shoulder... Like,ok, it was a dumb joke. But, obviously (or at least I think it's obvious) I do not actually believe that someone is racist because they don't like black jellybeans. That's (to me) clearly not a serious accusation of racism.

      it's going to be fine. as early as tomorrow, i think

3.25.24  4:05 pm   At what stage of your life do you think you'll go absolutely bonkers mad?

      that was a long time ago

3.25.24  1:48 pm   what is the first animal

      some kind of blob, i suppose

3.25.24  12:47 pm   Do you speak any languages besides English?

      almost

3.25.24  12:15 pm   What is your favorite jazz chord progression for guitar.

      F C

3.25.24  10:25 am   Have you ever been in an "improbable scenario"?

      yes

3.25.24  8:28 am   if you could say one thing to the entire world via an emergency phone alert, what would it be?

      hello world

3.25.24  7:58 am   how odd are hot air balloons on a scale of 1 to 10

      2

3.25.24  3:04 am   What type of bird feeder should I get? 

      type 1

3.25.24  2:06 am   what should I make a poem about?

      poems

3.25.24  12:12 am   why did the chicken cross the road?

      that's a trick question. the chicken did not cross the road

3.24.24  10:06 pm   i feel like i heard somewhere that you write the word "i" as "i" when referring to yourself, but write it as "I" when referring to somebody else, like if you were telling me how somebody said "I looked out the window" or something. is this true or did my brain make up this misinformation

      it's not true. in my opinion, "i" as the word for a person's self as spoken in the first-person is always better as lowercase, for many logical reasons, including the fact that the capital i looks too much like lowercase L in many fonts, and also that the letter "i" looks more personal almost as if it has an eye

3.24.24  9:37 pm   why is email so hilarious

      no mailman

3.24.24  8:26 pm   Do you enjoy listening to your own music?

      most of the time i'm afraid of it, and then a rare minority of the time i enjoy it way way too much

3.24.24  8:05 pm   If you were a book what genre would you be?

      i'd petition for the write to be genre-free

3.24.24  7:01 pm   can you think of a potato?

      no

3.24.24  6:59 pm   are you a huge gamer most of the time

      no, but that would be fun to say

3.24.24  6:53 pm   my guitar becomes flatter the higher up the fretboard i go, even if the open strings are tuned perfectly. do you know anything about how to fix this problem?

      this is quite a normal problem that can be fixed by a guitar service professional, who will likely begin by looking at the guitar longways in that iconic luthier pose

3.24.24  5:23 pm   What makes April feel like April

      the correct alignment of the calendar with the astronomical earth year. that causes april to occur in the same season every year, and thus have probably similar conditions, thereby reminding you of itself

3.24.24  4:40 pm   Say, have you ever wanted to collaborate with any other artists on music/any type of art? If so (or if not so), why?

      that sounds friendly, but it all means so much to me that it might be too intense for everyone involved

3.24.24  2:04 pm   Who would you cite as stylistic influences?

(And have you answered this already?)

      the list got so long i stopped keeping track of this

3.24.24  12:08 pm   Are platypus real?

      that's just what they want you to think

3.24.24  11:35 am   what's your opinion on oversize shoes

      too small

3.24.24  11:13 am   whats with you and quarter turned caps?

      nothing. i don't know what that is

3.24.24  9:56 am   have you ever swallowed an egg whole

      no

3.24.24  8:40 am   have you ever swim in a ocean while baking muffins

      no

3.24.24  5:26 am   Do you think turtles will be the next big thing?

      they are the current big thing

3.24.24  4:03 am   if you could watch tv/movies with subtitles that appear one word at a time as they're spoken, like in your videos, would you?  I'd want to at least try it, because as it is I'm always reading ahead and spoiling what they're going to say

      it's important to remember that i only do this sometimes. it's actually quite annoying if it's like this all the time. that's why sometimes, for certain types of lines, i make the whole line appear at once. and other ways too, depending on what works best for the given situation

3.24.24  2:51 am   If there is a speed of light is there a speed of darkness?

      i don't think so
